Abstract: The integration of robotics in construction is transforming traditional practices, shifting from mere automation to collaborative systems. This paper explores the evolution of construction robotics, emphasizing the role of advanced sensing technologies and industrial robots in enhancing architectural processes. By examining case studies and recent advancements, we highlight the potential of humanâ€“robot collaboration to improve efficiency, safety, and precision in construction tasks. The research underscores the importance of developing intuitive interfaces and adaptive systems that facilitate seamless interaction between human workers and robotic counterparts. Ultimately, this study provides insights into the future of construction, where robotics not only automate but also augment human capabilities.
